section.p: RFC 3501: Internet Message Access Protocol - Version 4rev1

section.name: Related projects
section.p: JaasLounge provides pure Java login modules for LDAP, NTLM and Active Directory.
jaas-pam is a Java bridge to PAM (Pluggable Authentication Modules). It needs a native library and will only work on Unix systems.
ShadowJAAS is a JAAS authentication provider using Unix shadow passwords.
